attributes.action: Make Ford fit secure locks to all of their Transit range!
attributes.additional_details:
There are security lock that stops this but at your expense! Calling on all people, trades or non trades to sign this petition to get ford to recall all transit and fit these locks to their expense! Some people after their tools get stolen can not afford the price of these locks 


Please help to stand up and get ford to sort this mess out!
attributes.background: Ford have made the transit van way to easy to break into! As shown by the guy from safe style on YouTube, in the last week my bosses van has been broken into and now my dads van to, Ford will do a security update which only stop the back doors from opening but the front will still unlock!

rejection.details: This is a commercial decision for Ford, not the UK Government or Parliament.
